item.title: 【Miscellaneous】PC GAMES - Silent Hill 3 (Enhanced Graphics and HD Cutscenes) [2003]
item.description:
Silent Hill 3 is the third installment in the Silent Hill survival horror series. It is the second game to be released on the PC and PlayStation 2, and unlike Silent Hill 2 and Silent Hill 4: The Room, it was never ported to the original Xbox. The game was developed by Team Silent and published by Konami, and it launched in North America on August 6, 2003.

Installation:
  1. Install Silent Hill 3:
    Hidden Content:
    You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.
  2. Once installed, go to the desktop, right click on the game shortcut and open the game directory folder.
  3. Download Silent Hill 3 - Widescreen Fix and extract its contents.
  4. Move scripts and dinput8.dll to the game directory.
  5. Open Silent Hill3.WidescreenFix.ini (inside scripts folder) and set these options:
[MAIN]
ResX = 0
ResY = 0
RenderResX = 1920
RenderResY = 1080
FixMenu = 1
FixFMV = 1​

[MISC]
FMVWidescreenMode = 2 // FMV letterboxing will be cropped to fill the screen. Use "FMVWidescreenMode = 2" if you have widescreen FMVs from HD collection.
DisableCutsceneBorders = 1 // Removes cutscene letterboxing.
DisableSafeMode = 1 // Prevents the game from using default settings after closing the game.
PixelationFix = 1 // Subtracts 0.5 from render resolution to fix transition bug.
StatusScreenRes = 512 // Controls resolution of status screen image.
ShadowsRes = 512 // Controls resolution of dynamic shadows.
DOFRes = 512 // Controls resolution of depth of field and other blur effects.
FrameRateFluctuationFix = 2 // Prevents the framerate from jumping between 60 FPS and 30 FPS. (1 = 60 FPS | 2 = 30 FPS)
ReduceCutsceneFOV = 0 // Cutscenes will use vert- scaling to hide off-screen characters.
SH2Reference = 1 // Enables several SH2 references for new saves. A feature from sh3proxy.
FogComplexity = 25 // The higher the value, the more detailed the fog appears. 25 = original value.​
6. Download Silent Hill 3 - HD Collection Cutscenes and extract its contents.
7. Run setup.exe as administrator and wait for the package to get installed.
8. If you followed step by step, then you're ready to play one of the best survival horror games ever!
LINKS:

item.author: danimanticore

item.title: 【Requests】[REQ CAP] - Alac lossless request for an album exclusively released only on apple music platform
item.description:
This is my first time posting on any internet forum. So sorry for my mistakes.

https://music.apple.com/in/album/hadh-ep/1529550113?ls
Above is the link to album that has been released only on apple. Theres no cd so i cant get wav/flac.
Can anyone help me get ALAC lossless 16bit 44.1khz for this album

If not the whole album The track "Parwardighara" is needed as its my favourite and want it
item.author: daichi
